entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `dotnet workload clean` fail after 8.0.400 #107233

Closed

  • [Perf] Regressions on System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Cache #106346
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Move TLS tests to unsupported list #107236
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve code coverage for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #107235
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Add FromFile to BinaryData #107231
    area-System.Memory, community-contribution

Merged

  • Remove O(N) List<T>.RemoveAt from RegexCache.Add #106581
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 10.0.0

Updated

  • Remove Helper Method Frames for Exception, GC and Thread methods #107218
    area-VM-coreclr, 10.0.0
  • [wasm] Handle exceptional cases when looking up unmanaged delegates #107113
    area-Interop-mono
  • Inline properties during importation #96325
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, Future
  • Remove helper method frame from Profiler hooks #107152
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/9.0] Fix RunClassConstructor trim warning for Nullable<T> #107039
    area-Tools-ILLink, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Skip more covariance checks #107116
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix encoding for certain k-mask instructions #107210
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump to updated llvm 19 #105427
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Chained comparison of two integers against a constant is not coalesced #102103
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Revert Revert "Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests (#80154)" #106965
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make `DomainAssembly` create its `Assembly` in its constructor and remove separate allocate load level #107224
    area-AssemblyLoader-coreclr
  • Rewrite GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte #104503
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [wasi] Process LinkerArg for wasi #107194
    area-Build-mono
  • Switch DirectoryControl to use AsnWriter, AsnDecoder #101512
    NO-MERGE, area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution, 10.0.0
  • Add test coverage for DirectoryServices.TransformControls #107201
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2528686 #105829
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • SuperPMI: ASPNET Collection job #106844
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Empty package ID in message when running `dotnet tool update -g --all` with up-to-date packages #43158

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't translate command, per the note #43159
  • Fix NullReferenceException for `dotnet tool update -g --all` #43157
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • EditorBrowsable on internal members #51269
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for tab based inline comments #74971
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Render exception documentation texts. #56162
    Area-IDE
  • Field-backed properties: support partial properties with auto-implemented accessors and with initializers #74959
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Filter type parameters in where clause #74970
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext_spring, single_query #57646

Closed

  • Processing errors adds duplicate error.type diagnostic tags to kestrel.connection.duration in Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.Kestrel #57558
  • Perf improvement: json #57639
  • Perf regression: mvc #57640

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57645
    area-infrastructure, 6.0.x
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57644
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.x
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `ff233bd` to `0953a17` #57643
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57561
    area-networking, 10.0-preview1

Updated

  • Add analyzer for custom IProblemDetailsWriter registration #49286
    area-mvc, analyzer, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal
  • HybridCache: relocate to dotnet/extensions #57611
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/9.0] Fix duplicate error.type on kestrel.connection.duration #57581
    Servicing-consider, area-networking
  • #51611 - Extended Blazor server and webassembly options to match web format. #54649
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-09-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Bug Has Returned - MAUI iOS Splash Screen Not Updated After First Install #24562

PullRequests

Created

  • [Android] invalidate shadows on parent's size change #24561
    platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, platform/iOS 🍎
  • fix ICanvas.ClipPath documentation #24560
    community ✨

Updated

  • Bump WinAppSDK to 1.6 #24266
    area-infrastructure
  • Applying visibility change to child controls #20154
    community ✨, area-controls-general
  • Fixed line break mode for buttons #20133
    area-layout, community ✨, area-controls-button
  • PullToRefresh & item selection when listView is not enabled [iOS] #20102
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-listview
  • [Android & iOS] dialog theme change on changing UserAppTheme #24559
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area-theme
  • [iOS] Tab Selected Icon Color not changing if using Font icons - fix #22437
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
